title: Implement Drag-and-Drop UI Functionality
description:
Create the frontend drag-and-drop functionality for dashboard widgets with visual feedback and ghost previews.

Acceptance Criteria:
1. Widgets can be dragged and repositioned on the dashboard grid
2. Visual feedback includes ghost preview during drag and drop zones
3. Smooth animations for widget movement and placement
4. Collision detection prevents widgets from overlapping
5. Grid snapping ensures proper alignment
6. Touch support for mobile drag-and-drop
7. Integration with existing placement logic from dashboard-layout.ts
8. Accessibility support for keyboard navigation
